page.title: 06WHITE HOUSE FARM,STOURPORT
page.content: The owner of White House Farm has lived there for 27 years.The house is 250 years old.There are 10 rooms in the house.There is approximately 310 acres.There are Hereford and Friesian cattle for beef production.White House Farm has a lot of machinery. The owner used to play down Gladder Brook and Areley Wood. Type of farmland: crops other than grass, intensively managed grassland.Main type of farming is arable-sugarbeet and potatoes and cereals with a few beef cattle. In the early part of the century the farm was mainly orchards.
